MemeDef.label: draconic
MemeDef.description: Dragons always lived their own way.

rulesStrings.li: creation(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->[deity0_name] granted us the knowledge of technology, that we may use it to improve ourselves and lead our world to better times.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->Our bio-engineers studied the works of [deity0_name].
intro(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] found the words of [deity0_name] buzzing within their head.

conflict(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->A luddite [foeLeader] envied the enhanced progress of the [memberNamePlural], and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] destroyed their workshops with [place_personalWeapon]s.
founderJoin(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->A cunning [place_job] named [founderName] flew on their wings to warn the [memberNamePlural] of the approach of the [foeSoldiers].

victory(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->[founderName] received divine technological knowledge from [deity0_name], and used it to enhance the bodies and minds of the [memberNamePlural] so they could defeat the [foeSoldiers].

setup(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->[founderName] was a brillian leader like no other. With human societies regressing before their very eyes, [founderName] saw that the only way to ensure the future of their species was advancement and improvement.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->[founderName] knew that living off the land is a road to nowhere.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->With human civilization collapsing and degrading, it was quite obvious that greed and selfishness if left unchecked would lead to disaster. It seemed that
lesson(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->we were burdened by all the same flaws, in some aspects perhaps much more so, but we had to do better
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->Technology was dangerous, yet savagery was not an option if we were to secure our future.
archistBasis(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->Humanity's pursuit of technology gave birth to the all-powerful archotechs as the rightful next step in the development of consciousness.
archistFact(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->Technology is the key to all of it.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will depart taking only the worthy with them. Humans have shown to be incompetent and incapable, but perhaps we are different?
animistBasis(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->The spirit world drives every action in the universe, and it is only by learning and controlling the laws of the universe that we can integrate with it.
animistFact(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->Like seeks like - build a device for a purpose and it will filled with a spirit of a like nature.
animistFact(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->When technology is fused with flesh, the spirits of both are combined and become more powerful.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_DraconicLife) ->[itIsSaid] that one day the wielder of the [relic0_name] will summon its spirit and through that the salvation will come.

PreceptDef.label: Abhorrent
PreceptDef.description: Fungus food is an unforgivable crime against anyone's basic decency.

li.label: ate raw fungus
li.description: I had to eat fungus. Honestly, death is a preferable alternative to this nightmare.

li.label: ate a meal with fungus
li.description: I had to eat a meal with fungus. I think I'd have rather starved to death.
